medical_history.chief_complaint: A 3-year-old boy referred for further evaluation of Gaucher disease.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient exhibited moderate sensorineural hearing loss, and at 17 months, hepatosplenomegaly was noted. He was diagnosed with type 3 Gaucher disease after a bone marrow biopsy. Significant resolution of organomegaly was observed following initiation of enzyme replacement therapy at 17 months.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient has a medical history of Wolff-Parkinson-White arrhythmia, bicuspid aortic valve, motor delay (ambulating at 26 months), and moderate sensorineural hearing loss.
medical_history.family_history: Paternal family history of autosomal dominant Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease type I.
